main_definition: A set of clothes, typically consisting of a jacket and trousers or skirt made from the same material.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fit or appropriate for someone's tastes, personality, or needs
meanings_and_examples.example: The bright green shirt does not suit him; he prefers more muted colors.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opportunity that is well-suited to a particular person or situation
meanings_and_examples.example: This job offer suits my skills and experience perfectly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of bringing something into harmony or agreement with something else
meanings_and_examples.example: I tried to suit the design of our new product line with our existing brand image.
